plan(1,init, sentence(true,move( switchplan(checkObstacle) ),'','' ))
plan(1,checkObstacle, sentence(true,not here ActionMove,'','' ))
plan(2,checkObstacle, sentence( obstacledata( VAL),move(print,uuuuu( VAL)),'','' ))
plan(3,checkObstacle, sentence(true,move(print,"checking"),'','' ))
plan(4,checkObstacle, sentence(true,delay( ) ,'','' ))
plan(5,checkObstacle, sentence(true,move(repeatplan) ,'','' ))
plan(6,checkObstacle, sentence(true,move(resumeplan),'','' ))
